Description: Typical range for industrial cleaning of ceramics like AlN to avoid thermal damage; starting at 100 W balances efficiency and safety. Max ~200 W before risking substrate ablation. Source: IPG Photonics laser cleaning systems specs for delicate materials.

Pulse duration for minimal thermal penetration

Number of cleaning cycles for complete removal
Beam overlap for consistent surface treatment
